function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential reactivation of pathogens during air transport after central disinfection","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and reduced air quality","Mitigation":"Decentralized air disinfection using germicidal sources in ventilation ducts","Technologies":"Germicidal UV-C sources for air disinfection","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building management and facility maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Risk of SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A, and Legionella pneumophila transmission through indoor air","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases and increased health risks","Mitigation":"Use of germicidal sources to disinfect transported air","Technologies":"Germicidal UV-C emitters for air disinfection","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building management and facility maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate air exchange leading to high indoor air contamination levels","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and reduced air quality","Mitigation":"Use of UV-C emitters for air disinfection while maintaining air circulation and recuperation","Technologies":"UV-C emitters for air disinfection","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building management and facility maintenance teams"}]}
